unit.utterance: maumwi a gabaw gaw chyahkyawn hte u hka a lam.
unit.utterance_translation: The title of the story is "The story of a wolf and a crow".

unit.utterance: kalang mi na da ndai
unit.utterance_translation: Once upon a time, it's said, well,

unit.utterance: u hka langai mi gaw masha a shat gawk langai mi kaw
unit.utterance_translation: in a kitchen of a man, a crow,

unit.utterance: shinggyim-masha na shatgawk langai mi kaw she shan tawng, shan tawng langai mi ga kaw hkrat taw ai mu na
unit.utterance_translation: in a kitchen of a man, a crow saw a situation where meat was on the ground.

unit.utterance: shi gaw dai hpe kalang ta gagat pyen shang na she
unit.utterance_translation: (She) flew and entered (into the room) at once, and she

unit.utterance: kalang ta gra chyit rai na
unit.utterance_translation: grasped it at once.

unit.utterance: dai hpe she makrang hpai na she
unit.utterance_translation: (She) carried it holding it in her mouth.

unit.utterance: grai pyaw ai hte wa na she shi gaw hpun ndung langai mi kaw sha sa na nga na she
unit.utterance_translation: (She) returned happily and went to the top of a tree and stayed there.

unit.utterance: hpai na she nga taw nga yang she
unit.utterance_translation: (She) carried (the meat), and when (she) stayed there

unit.utterance: shi gaw dai hpe lang di na dung taw nga yang she
unit.utterance_translation: she held it and (she) was sitting there.

unit.utterance: le hpun n pu kaw she chyahkyawn langai mi lai wa ai.
unit.utterance_translation: A wolf passed under the tree.

unit.utterance: chyahkyawn langai mi lai wa she
unit.utterance_translation: A wolf passed by and

unit.utterance: shi gaw ntsa de yu dat tai she
unit.utterance_translation: she looked up and

unit.utterance: dai u hka dai gaw shan shan tawng dai hpai di nga taw nga ai mu yang
unit.utterance_translation: saw that the crow was carrying the meat.

unit.utterance: shi sha mayu na she
unit.utterance_translation: She wanted to eat (it).

unit.utterance: ndai hpe ngai gara hku galaw ra na i nga na myit taw nga yang she
unit.utterance_translation: (She) thought, "How can I get it?"

unit.utterance: shi tsun dat ai.
unit.utterance_translation: She said,

unit.utterance: aw ok ngai lu sai nga tsun na she
unit.utterance_translation: "Oh, OK, I got (the meat)," (she) said and

unit.utterance: shi gaw e jinghku u hka e nang gaw da grai tsawm ai.
unit.utterance_translation: she said "Hey, friend crow, you are very beautiful.

unit.utterance: nang na gawng shingyang ni mung grai tsawm ai.
unit.utterance_translation: Your body and form are also very beautiful.

unit.utterance: nang na nsam mung grai tsawm ai i
unit.utterance_translation: Your color is also very beautiful, isn't it?

unit.utterance: nang na nsen mung grai pyaw na re.
unit.utterance_translation: Your voice will also sound very good.

unit.utterance: Hka u jinghku u hka nang gaw i ndai anhte u amyu ni ting na hkawhkam jan pyi tai gying sai.
unit.utterance_translation: Crow, my friend crow, you are even worthy of being the queen of all birds.

unit.utterance: nang na nsen mung grai pyaw ai.
unit.utterance_translation: Your voice also sounds good."

unit.utterance: nang na nsen sha pyi kalang mi sha gaw madat mayu ai nga tsun dat yang she
unit.utterance_translation: (She) said, "I want to listen to your voice even once."

unit.utterance: oh ra langai mi mung she dai hku shi hpe shapyaw ya.
unit.utterance_translation: The other one [= the wolf] pleased her [= the crow] like that.

unit.utterance: shi hpe shakawn yang she shi gaw grai na ra di na she
unit.utterance_translation: (The wolf) praised her and she liked (it) very much, and

unit.utterance: ngoi dat ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: (ahe) cawed, it's said.

unit.utterance: ngoi dat ai hte dai shan tawng di hkawn mat ai.
unit.utterance_translation: (She) cawed and the meat fell down.

unit.utterance: shan tawng dai di hkawn mat jang she
unit.utterance_translation: The meat fell and

unit.utterance: shi gaw oh ra langai mi mung mau mat sai le i.
unit.utterance_translation: the one [= the crow] was surprised, wasn't she?

unit.utterance: ndai u hka mung mau mat na she
unit.utterance_translation: This crow was surprised and

unit.utterance: dai hku dung taw nga yang she dai chyahkyawn dai gaw tsun ai.
unit.utterance_translation: (she) was sitting like this, and the wolf said,

unit.utterance: jinghku u hka nang gaw da tsawm ma grai tsawm ai.
unit.utterance_translation: "Friend crow, you are very beautiful.

unit.utterance: mahku ma grai pyaw ai i.
unit.utterance_translation: Your voice also souds very good, doesn't it?

unit.utterance: raitim mung nang hpaji naw ra ai yaw.
unit.utterance_translation: But you still need knowledge.

unit.utterance: nang dai hte sha rai nngut shi ai nga na tsun kau da na.
unit.utterance_translation: You have not finished with this yet," (she) said, and

unit.utterance: shan tawng hpe sha kau na
unit.utterance_translation: (she) ate the meat.

unit.utterance: sha kau ya ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: (She) ate the meat, it's said.

unit.utterance: Dai she oh ra langai mi mung shi na hpaji hte i shi na hpaji hte masha ni na jaw njaw teng nteng hpe shanwg hpang mung nmyit yu ai.
unit.utterance_translation: Then, the one [= the crow] did not think, with her knowledge, whether what others say is correct or not.

unit.utterance: tsun dat ai hte hkan galaw ai.
unit.utterance_translation: She followed what the others said.

unit.utterance: marang e shi na shan tawng hpe mung shamat kau ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: (She) also lost her meat, it's said.
